catalog_script_client.name: Validate Email

sys_update_version.name: catalog_script_client_6699360f2f3df010b14c5fd62799b644
sys_update_version.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="catalog_script_client"><catalog_script_client action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><active>true</active><applies_catalog>true</applies_catalog><applies_extended>false</applies_extended><applies_req_item>false</applies_req_item><applies_sc_task>false</applies_sc_task><applies_target_record>false</applies_target_record><applies_to>item</applies_to><cat_item display_value="Intern Registration">9e99320f2f3df010b14c5fd62799b6bf</cat_item><cat_variable/><condition/><description/><field/><global>true</global><isolate_script>true</isolate_script><messages/><name>Validate Email</name><order/><script><![CDATA[function onChange(control, oldValue, newValue, isLoading) {
    if (isLoading || newValue == '') {
        return;
    }

    //Type appropriate comment here, and begin script below
    var re = /^[A-Za-z.0-9]+@accenturefederal.com$/;
	if(!re.test(newValue)){
		alert("Invalid email address. Note: must end with @accenturefederal.com ");
	}

}]]></script><sys_class_name>catalog_script_client</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2021-08-10 20:34:29</sys_created_on><sys_domain>global</sys_domain><sys_domain_path>/</sys_domain_path><sys_id>6699360f2f3df010b14c5fd62799b644</sys_id><sys_mod_count>1</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Validate Email</sys_name><sys_overrides/><sys_package display_value="Training Tracker" source="x_167994_training">b9a77c3c2f1130101caaff1df699b687</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Training Tracker">b9a77c3c2f1130101caaff1df699b687</sys_scope><sys_update_name>catalog_script_client_6699360f2f3df010b14c5fd62799b644</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2021-08-10 20:43:15</sys_updated_on><table/><type>onChange</type><ui_type>0</ui_type><variable_set/><view/></catalog_script_client></record_update>
